html: Isaiah 7:5-6. Syria and Ephraim have taken evil, or mischievouscounsel, saying, Let us go up against Judah, and vex it—Hebrew, נקיצנה , harass, weary, ordistress it; and make a breach therein — Violently break in upon the land, or break their power and kingdom, and subdue it to ourselves;and set a king in the midst of it—Or viceroy, that shall act by our authority;even the son of Tabeal—Some considerable captain, in whose fidelity both of them had great confidence; but whether he was an Israelite or Syrian is uncertain, and not material.
